Package Controller

Class NoteController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controller.NoteController

  • public class NoteController
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the controller for the model. View should deal with the model through this controller.
    Author:
    Jiacheng Yang, Wenkai Zheng

      • newSection

        public void newSection​()
        This method makes a new section in model. It makes sure that the id is not duplicated. (unless exceeding the upper bound of java integer 2^32)
